title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 831.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 831.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

If the Commissioner gives notice of any action pursuant to
provisions of this Chapter for which an opportunity to be heard is provided, the provisions of this Part shall apply. Notice shall include the time within
which a hearing must be requested. Notes

New

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
